name: Lukas Böhres
title: B. Sc.
cv: Lukas Böhres was a student research assistant from April 2018 until September 2019, funded by the DFG Initiative of Excellence. Together with Frederic Kerksieck, he was responsible for programming the CSS Lab Tools and the CSS Lab website. Having successfully completed the Bachelor’s program in Computer Science at RWTH Aachen University, he is currently enrolled in the follow-up Master’s program at the University of Mainz. Since October 2019 he is Trainee - Technology Consultant at PwC Frankfurt. His Bachelor’s thesis was presented to the Chair for Computer Animation of RWTH Aachen University in 2018 and holds the title "Optimization Integrator for Hair Simulation".
